item.description:
We're having a Halloween-themed shoot with models, costumes, and unique face painting by Paul Roustan. Shooting will be from 3-5 pm in the Neal Rantoul Vault Theater at LynnArts. Studio lighting will be provided. Some sets will be lit with (non-strobe) stage lighting; feel free to bring your on-camera strobes if you will prefer strobe lighting for those sets.

We are expecting the following models at the shoot:
Eleanor Taormina
Jo-Jo
Luz Batista
Ida
Charlie (tentative)
A couple of other models may also be present; watch this space for updates!

Costumes will include a sexy pirate costume, sheer black kimono, Japanese wedding kimono, and Japanese swords, all complemented with matching faces by Roustan. This will be a good shoot to get those unusual images that make your portfolio stand out!

All photographers, models, and makeup artists from this group are welcome and invited to attend. You're welcome to arrive any time after 2pm, and indeed we could use a couple of hands before the shoot to help set up, so please do come early if you can.

Photographers will be asked to pay a $40 fee. If you just want to stop by and meet people, there is no charge, but in that case please sign up for the Meet and Greet meetup description so we know what to expect.

Please RSVP now so we can gauge the interest in this event and know what mix of talented individuals from this group would like to attend. As a comment on your RSVP, please indicate whether you want to attend as a photographer, a model, makeup artist, just to meet people, or in some other capacity.
item.name: Halloween Theme Shoot
